transcript: God, I feel as though my entire life is going to be spent standing on the beach with my eyes wide open and my hands clasped expectantly waiting for the fish to show up.

segments.text: God, I feel as though my entire life is going to be spent standing on the beach with my
eyes wide open and my hands clasped expectantly waiting for the fish to show up.
